DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy safety Adapalene Gel 0.3 % treatment atrophic acne scar .
DOC.brief_title: Adapalene Gel 0.3 % Treatment Atrophic Acne Scars
DOC.criteria: Male female subject race , age 18 50 year inclusive Subjects past history acne moderate severe facial atrophic acne scar Subjects active inflammatory acne lesion Subjects hypertrophic acne scar
